subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony leads the N.B.A. in minutes played, but he was able to take a few breathers during the Knicks’ victory over the Nets as the team played more crisply.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony leads the N.B.A. in minutes played, but he was able to take a few breathers during the Knicks’ victory over the Nets as the team played more crisply.
